home.part3: I am interested in many different things, I program, I stroll, I travel, I read comic books.

m19.title: Lead Software Engineer at
m19.description: Developing tools to help brands with Amazon ads.

criteo.title: Dev lead at
criteo.description1: From 2019, led a team of 6 engineers, providing applications and tools to serve a library of banner components (text, images, videos, scripts) with a uniform quality across browsers and devices.
criteo.description2: Started as a software engineer and joined multiple projects in the company: new inventory (e.g. native ads, video retargeting), new products for brands, new dynamic creative components.

amadeus.title: Software engineer at
amadeus.description1: From 2012, worked in Airport IT division to work on an highly available mediation layer and airport service bus.
amadeus.description2: Started as a software engineer working on internal tools for the e-commerce division.

amadeus-thesis.title: Master Thesis at
amadeus-thesis.description1: Design and implementation of a high-throughput distributed task execution system to improve the releasing process of the Amadeus e-commerce products.
amadeus-thesis.description2: Grade A. Finalist of the Amadeus Intern Contest (4th).

sics.title: Developer at the
sics.description: Persistent messaging in Java using MySQL Cluster. Development of a persistence plugin for Apache ActiveMQ.

diadeis.title: Intern at
diadeis.description: For the publication of the Official Journal of the European Union, design and development of a performant XSL-FO processor in C# for Arbortext Advanced Print Publisher (AAPP). The engine can handle the XSL-FO and the MathML standards.

cnrs.title: Intern at CNRS (Versailles)
cnrs.description: Design and implementation in Java of a rÃ©sumÃ© "search engine" coupled to an XML extraction Swing UI for analyzis. This internship was part of a sociology research project (analysis of the W3C standardization processes).

philips.title: Assembly line worker at Philips Lighting (Aachen)
philips.description: After several assignments on the assembly line, wrote a report about quality management in the industry.

prepas.description: Preparation for the competitive entrance examination to prestigious French engineering universities
